name: Bengt Jonsson 0001
content: Homepage of Bengt Jonsson Research Automated Verification Synchronization Modeling Model Generation and Testing Publications Teaching Contact info UPPSALA UNIVERSITET: Information Technology Bengt Jonsson Professor in Computer Systems Email: bengt.jonsson [at] it dot uu dot se Phone: +46 - 18 - 471 3157 Research My main research interests are in the areas of formal methods, especially in connection with real-time and distributed systems, semantics, verification and testing of concurrent systems, and security. NEW M.Sc. projects available: Testing a new Security Protocol for IoT CAV Award 2017 SSIoT 2019 IEEE EuroSP Workshop on Software Security for IoT Co-located with IEEE EuroSandP 2019 16 June 2019, Stockholm --> Publications Some activities (under construction) Ph.D. Students: Hooman Asadian, Samuel Grahn, Magnus Lång Fredrik Tåkvist, Member of the Security Arena at the Dept. of IT Projects: Designed for UPDATE, safe update of embedded software. aSSIsT, Secure Software for the IoT. UPMARC, A Center of Excellence on Software Technology for Multicore Programming Past Projects: CoDeR-MP, Computationally Demanding Real-Time Applications on Multicore Platforms ProFun, A Programming Platform for Future Wireless Sensor Networks CONNECT, a project on synthesis of networked components. Past and Current Courses: Ph.D. course on symbolic execution starts February 10, 15.15 - 17.00, 2021. Reading group on software testing and fuzzing starts February 28, 2019. Model Based Development of Embedded Systems Some links Summer Schools Interesting Conferences Verification Tools Personal I enjoy Piano Playing and Orienteering Family To be added Last updated 15 April 2007. Responsible: Bengt Jonsson. Web: Contact. Copyright � 2006 Uppsala University, Department of Information Technology.
